text: “thaththa nathiwela dawas kiyada nanda.
emenma 19 wana aandukrama wyawastha sanshodhanayen sthapitha kerunu swadhina komisan sabha athara mathiwarana komisama purna balathala sahithawa pawathwana prathama mathiwaranaya da meyayi.

owun honda midiyusin sewaya karana bawa ana kele ya.
"oya oya hadanne mawa kenthi gassanna..
mese pawasuwe ayishage paudgalika nithignyawaraya.
aasanna puwath pradhana puwath nawa aandukrama wyawasthawa labana masaye parlimenthuwata gena eeme sudanamak
inna idikirim karamin wana athara api eya nirantharayen yawathkalina kirima saha watina thorathuru samaga oba laba athi heyin apage web adawiya wetha susara.
me nisa shri lankawe theth kalapiya wananthara raka ganime awashyathawa itha wadagath bawa pahadiliyi.
ihatha sandahan deaakarayama waradisahagathaya.
rajya sewakayanta rupiyal daha dahaka watup wadiwimak diyahaki yayi owunwath wishwasa karanne natha.
guwan hamudapathiwaraya idiri wasarath kese ho randi sitimata prabala uthsahayaka niratha wu bawa me wana wita samastha guwan hamudawa pamanak nowa ratama danna prakata karunaki.

rajya amathiwarunge wagakima wanne rajya departhamenthu bala ganimayi.

halapayiyath eekama nowa kiyala thiyenne.
ohuth ayath ekata sita gath chaya­rupa yatin aththe ohu wisin liyana lada kawi pela­walya.
in anathuruwa kinniya kridakayin hata palamu ardhaya awasan wannata pera golayak wartha karagannata itha pahasu awasthawan kihipayakma himiwuwath eewa sarthaka karaganimata owun samath wuye natha.

kopula matha wagirenna akamathi kadulu ulpatha hamuwuna wisula muthu ata tharam bijuwata bolwa giya kala wiyalila wapula sinahawa nelaganne kohomadayi ma sanasila depaya pirimada nagunu karagata sathapawannata nowapama sidunu diyawara alaweli maga sulanga samagin awidala ahasa nethwida wahi walakulu isawwaka iwa soya soya gamana nonimu bayisikalaye ikiya mathakaye thawaruna hithaka podi bandi pathum ahula pothaka thanpath kara thiya dineka pidena maharu aswanu nelagannata magabala amathi mathiwaru labadi sithpa sanda da tharukata bima thiya sihina podiyen obe sihine tikin tika horakam kala ..

dan obata ohu kawurudayi yanna kimata thawath karana awasi nowanu atha.
samudra thruna bhumi sithiyamgatha kirimath wadagath."

dashaka kipayaka idala karapu ekak nam hoyala balanna watinawa.dan wage gajamatik wahiwahala nathikale karapu nisa godak ayata prayojanawath wenna athi kiyala hithenawa.samahara welawata apatath thanakata gihilla dinaya liyanna giyahama amathaka wena welawaluth thiyenawane.pare yaddi arama dakinna thibunama hodata mathake rada pawathinawane.ema niwasin nathiwa asalwasiyakugen obatama danaganna hakiwewine henri.apeth kuthuhalaya awssala uththara nathiwa enawa neme niwaduwa ahawara karala therunayi :):):):)
“ane aruni…mage aththammata mokada me wune…”ayawa ekawarama sihimurja wi ada watuni.
ee wagema me gataluwa wyaptha kirimata katayuthu kala pudgalayan sambandhayenuth nithiya kriyathmaka karanawa.

ran pawum pahak watina ran damwalak kollakama saha langa thaba ganime chodanawata adhikaranaya hamuwe warada piliganna yayi pawasamin panadura polisiyedi sarayanwarayaku saha kosthapalwarayaku thamata 17.07.11 dina paharadi adhikaranaya hamuwata idiripath kale yayi panadura pinwaththe lahiru pradip silwa panadura mahesthrath aar. es. disanayaka hamuwe pawasiya.hethema ese pawasuwe nithignya sugath handunge mahatha magin adhikaranaya wetha paminili karamini.
